type.name: org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseJavaSourceSettings
type.description:
Describes Eclipse Java source settings for compiling and running some Java source code.
@since 2.10

method.name: getTargetBytecodeVersion
getSourceLanguageLevel
method.description:
Returns the Java source language level.

returns:The source language level. Never returns null.

method.name: getJdk

property.name: jdk
targetBytecodeVersion
sourceLanguageLevel
property.description:
Returns the Java source language level.

returns:The source language level. Never returns null.
